title: Pingu in the City
synopsis: Pingu and his family move from their small village to the big city; in which there are many people with many different occupations. The ever-curious Pingu tries to join them at their jobs, but his mischievous side gets the better of him and he ends up messing things up.
staff: [['Iwata, Naomi', ['Director']], ['Asai, Shingo', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Ueno, Kimiko', ['Script']], ['Tanabe, Shigenori', ['Script']]]
